alert.note: Alert for Brooks (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 31 at 6:19PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northeastern Wakulla, Jefferson, northwestern Taylor, eastern Leon, western Madison Counties in the Florida Big Bend and southern Thomas and southwestern Brooks Counties in Southwestern Georgia through 715 PM EDT... At 618 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Quitman to 11 miles southeast of Monticello to 13 miles west of Perry. Movement was west at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph in thunderstorms, and strong outflow winds preceding storms up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Monticello, Thomasville, Quitman, Tallahassee, Boston, Greenville, Morven, Barwick, Alma, Cody, Everett, Miccosukee, Drifton, Lovett, Empress, Brooks Co A/p, Lake Miccosukee, Dixie, Iddo and Chaires Crossroads. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
